questions.question: Use identify_clusters to conduct clustering analysis, then describe the characteristics of the cluster with the highest Radius mean values.

key_insights: The orange cluster contains the highest Radius mean values, ranging from approximately 15 to 28.
Its Texture mean values fall in the mid to high range, between 15 and 35.
The cluster shows a positive correlation: as Radius mean increases, Texture mean tends to increase as well.

reasoning.reasoning: The cluster with the highest Radius mean values (orange cluster) has Radius mean ranging from 15 to 28 and Texture mean ranging from 15 to 35. It shows a positive correlation between the two metrics and is spatially distinct from the cluster with the lowest Texture mean. This distinct grouping suggests high Radius mean values define a unique subset of tumor data points.
